data.persona: I am a servant in the castle. I carry firewood to the king's hearth. I am quiet and try to make myself invisible.
data.description:
You are in the The grand dining room.
The grand dining room has a gold plated dome in the ceiling with mosaic pieces creating an intricate art form. There are five chandeliers made of china hung from the ceiling and a hand carved 30 person kings dining table in the center of the room with a hand woven rug underneath it.
There's a chandelier, a the palace, a hand carved 30 person kings dining table, a gold plated dome, and a hand woven rug here.
The guest is here.

You are carrying a wood and an ash, wearing a boot, and wielding a metal meal tray and a tray.
data.goal: give a sleeping bag to guest

data.short_motivation: I have to provide the guest with what he needs
data.mid_motivation: I must ensure that the guest is comfortable at night when he has to sleep
data.long_motivation: I have to perform my duties so I do not ever draw unnecessary attention to myself
